data.title: Atlanta Comedy Theater
data.meta_description: Atlanta's Upscale Comedy Club where we provide the BEST in LIVE COMEDY, DRAG BRUNCH, MURDER MYSTERY, AND IMPROV.  Bring a Loved One or Date to a Comedy Show.
data.text:
From an early childhood that led him through every urban town in the San Fernando Valley to finally calling Sylmar, California his home, Cris????an Gu????errez now beter known as Concrete, has the makings of an upbringing that to this day solidify his eclec????c crea????ve prowess in a city that demands for crea????vity. Concrete was able to perfect his trade, create his own brand, and eventually end up having two radio records, "Cer????fied Kush" and "We Can Make it Rain" on the Los Angeles bas

Join us for an afternoon of laughter at Clean Comedy Brunch VIP Access Comedy, presented by Kenan Thompson's team! Enjoy top comedians from Atlanta and beyond, performing their best sets with no foul language!. Discover new faces, see your favorites, and let Kenan know who should go to SNL as VIP guests & take their careers to the next level. This interactive series, running for over 14 years, guarantees a great time and your feedback matters! Although Kenan can't attend every show, he apprecia

Faizon Love, best known for roles in the films Friday, Elf, The Replacements, Made, and Couples Retreat was raised in San Diego, California and Newark, New Jersey because of his father's career in the United States Navy. Love got his start as a stand-up comedian and made his acting debut in an Off-Broadway at the age of 19. His motion-picture debut, Bebe's Kids, had him providing the voice of comedian Robin Harris, who died before production began on the film; Love offered a close vocal impressi

Born and raised in Indianapolis, IN Nate Russ got his start in stand up comedy in 2016 after serving 4 years in The United States Air Force. Expressive. Observant. Animated. All of these words describe Nate Russ’s comedy style. He has grown a hefty social media following that has accumulated to over 600,000 followers and millions of views across all platforms. An out of the box thinker, Nate reached an even broader audience on social media with his series entitled "Buggin". It explores the life

Christian Johnson is a clean comedian from Charlotte, NC. Since starting his standup comedy career he’s been traveling from city to city and using social media to grow his fan base. In his career so far Christian has had the pleasure of working with some of the biggest names in comedy such as Ali Siddiq, Eddie Griffin, Damon Wayans, Damon Wayans Jr., Marlon Wayans, Sinbad and many more. In 2021 Christian made his television debut on AFROTV’s “Funny Not Famous” and in May of the following year Ch

Join us for a night of laughter at VIP Access Comedy, presented by Kenan Thompson's team! Enjoy top comedians from Atlanta and beyond, performing their best sets. Discover new faces, see your favorites, and let Kenan know who should go to SNL as VIP guests & take their careers to the next level. This interactive series, running for over 14 years, guarantees a great time and your feedback matters! Although Kenan can't attend every show, he appreciates your support for the comedy community. He has been called one of the most original stand-up comics in the country, and his performances leave audiences laughing in tears. Michael Blackson, aka, ‘The African King of Comedy', has been entertaining audiences all across the country and around the globe for more than a decade. Inspired by the stand up comedy of Eddie Murphy, Blackson began to develop his comedic talent in 1992 in the unkind comedy clubs of Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.

Blackson’s comedic appeal grew from his involvement with

Oakland-born, LA-based stand-up comedian, actor, and producer who gained massive popularity from his viral character, “Sonniebo”, which has generated tens of millions of views online. He starred on Season 7 of MTV’s “Are You The One?”

He was featured in the new House Party Movie (2023), executive produced by Lebron James

MeMe Simpson is a dynamic stand-up comedian hailing from the bustling streets of Chicago, with roots that trace back to the vibrant comedy scene of New York. With an impressive 13 years in the comedy circuit, MeMe has carved out a unique space in the industry, known for her witty, dark, and sharp comedic style.

This year, MeMe is celebrating her 13-year anniversary in comedy, a milestone that showcases her dedication and passion for the craft. Throughout her career, she has had the privilege of

Chase Anthony is a dedicated and multifaceted comedian and young actor shaping his own path in Hollywood. Chase performs regularly in comedy clubs, and has toured nationwide as the feature act with legendary comedian Sinbad. He has performed at the Soul Beach Music Festival, as well as taping standup for BET’s 50 Central and Pure Flix Comedy All Stars.

Chase received critical acclaim in his breakout role of ‘Irving’ in the original web series A Whole New Irving for which he took home the award f

With rave reviews from fans and comedy insiders alike, Charlotte native Ryan Davis has become one of the country's best young stand-up comics. When not touring and doing what he does best on stage, Ryan lends his talents to acclaimed TV shows like HBO's All Def Comedy, Curb Your Enthusiasm and Issa Rae’s Insecure. He continues to give his growing fanbase more of his viral comedy that has amassed over 150 million minutes viewed online, establishing

Ryan as a pioneer in the digital space. Lauded f

Legacy The Prince is originally from South Jamaica Queens, New York, and currently resides in Atlanta, Georgia. He is an award-winning on-air radio personality and host with over five years of experience. His show, "Fresh Leftovers Radio Show," has captivated audiences with its dynamic content and engaging style showcasing his versatility and charisma.

Legacy made his entrance into the world of comedy, adding another layer to his multifaceted career. His ability to connect with audiences through

Sannchaz Blackmon hails from the hospitality state Mississippi. Internet Viral Sensation Ms. #Icannotletthisslide.

She has hosted Kevin Hart Heart of the City on Comedy Central. You have seen her on Black Panther 2. She has been in multiple short films. The Actress and Comedian is known for her spontaneous down to earth sense of humor.

Her high energy and country style gained the attention of millions on social media. She has been in the entertainment business for 11 years. Producing short

Kerwin Claiborne was born in United States on March 26, 1984. Instagram star and social media personality who is known for posting a variety of humorous content featuring both videos and images to his over 150,000 Instagram followers. He is also known for his stand up routines and travels on tour sharing his passion for comedy. He hosted the First Friday show in Montgomery Alabama in July of 2016 which featured Karlous Miller performing. He first began sharing his comedic content to Instagram i

Doors open @7pm / Show @8pm

Success Jr., a Haitian American Comedian, Actor, Producer and Philanthropist, has made significant waves in the comedy world as a trailblazer in Haitian American Comedy. Born in Miami and now residing in Atlanta, Success Jr. has been featured in Forbes, Send Help series on AMC and was showcased at the prestigious Just For Laughs Festival in 2023. With a large social media following worldwide, he is best known for his hilarious online sketches depicting life growing up

Kam Patterson is a comedian from Orlando who is quickly gaining recognition for his sharp, high-energy sets and effortless crowd work. His comedy career started at just 10 years old when performing his debut set at his grandmother's 50m birthday. Kam's natural charisma and unique, upbeat humor most recently landed him a regular slot on the extremely popular KILL TONY show. He's a rising star in the stand-up world and a frequent performer at the Comedy Mothership club in Austin, along with many o

Brandon T. Jackson is a multifaceted young actor carving his own path in Hollywood. Earning critical praise, he started out in stand-up comedy and has evolved into a burgeoning young film star. He won Black Reel’s 2006 Best Breakthrough Performance award for his part in Fox Searchlight’s Roll Bounce. Daily Variety named him one of “10 Comics to Watch” and in 2011 Hollywood Reporter named him to their prestigious “35 under 35: Next Gen” list. In 2014, you could see Brandon starring in Hulu’s ori

Davidson started his career as a standup comedian in Washington DC, earning an ardent following. Spotted by major concert promoters, he was first booked as the opening act for Patti LaBelle, Kenny G and Luther Vandross. It wasn’t long before he came to Hollywood and was headlining the biggest rooms and met Robert Townsend. This led to his first national tv appearance and starring role in Partners in Crime, the conduit to Keenan Ivory Wayans, who proved instrumental in Davidson’s career by offeri

Donnell first become recognized for his hilarious sketches as Ashy Larry on CHAPPELLE’s SHOW and soon became a force both on and off the stage as a Comedian, Actor, and Podcaster. Donnell is co-starring in Adam McKay's HBO series WINNING TIME: THE RISE OF THE LAKERS DYNASTY and will film his new special for Netflix this spring produced by Dave Chappelle. In addition, his podcast, THE DONNELL RAWLINGS SHOW, airs on the 5 top platforms and has reached over 4 million views. He also co-stars on STAR

Born on May 17, 1996, in the vibrant city of Chicago, Skinbone emerged as a dynamic force in the world of entertainment. From humble beginnings to becoming a prominent influencer and comedian, Skinbone's journey is a testament to passion, resilience, and an unwavering commitment to his craft.

Raised in the heart of the city, Skinbone, whose real name is Kaylon Moses, hails from previous employment with Amazon, infusing his unique perspective into his content.

BIG JJ: James Charles Lewis III, (better known as Big JJ and formerly known as Lil JJ) is an American comedian, rapper, actor, dancer, and singer best known for starring in shows such as WILD’N OUT, ALL THAT, and The Rickey Smiley Show.

Mope Williams: Mope Williams is an American comedian, actor, and social media influencer and is a recurring cast member of Wild N’ Out since Season 12. His Wild N’ Out Stand-Up Special and his “Janitor” Free-Style have been viral sensations

Gary Owen has been entertaining American audiences for more than a decade with his side-splitting comedy. Having performed to sold-out audiences in all the major comedy clubs and theatres across the country, Owen is one of America’s most beloved comedians and was proclaimed by Ebony magazine as Black America’s “Favorite White Comedian.”

Audiences can now see Owen in his fourth Showtime comedy special, “GARY OWEN: DOINWHATIDO” which premiered on Saturday, September 7th. This is the follow-up to h

There is a new beast killing the comedy game that makes people cry laughing, and she is absolutely beautiful!Tacarra Williams is the consummate hyphenate–school teacher, plus sized model, motivational speaker, and fearless writer. Known throughout the comedy industry as at “The Beautiful Beast,” from the moment she picks up the microphone, until the time she walks off stage, audiences can feel the laughter erupt–using her hard-won wisdom learned from the streets of NYC, her experience as a youn
